statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 0 \\ 2 \\ -3 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 1 \\ -2 \\ 2 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -2 \\ -3 \\ -2 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 2 \\ 6 \\ 6 \\ -6 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -9 \\ -6 \\ -14 \\ -7 \\ 3 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
